text: Ebam taderake yate sanakta kara yaya yara munaphika chila. Ara taderake bala hala eso, allahara rahe lara'i kara kimba satrudigake pratihata kara. Tara balechila, amara yadi janatama ye, lara'i habe, tahale abasya'i tomadera sathe thakatama. Se dina tara imanera tulanaya kupharira kachakachi chila. Ya tadera antare ne'i tara nijera mukhe se katha'i bale bastutahallaha bhalabhabe janena tara ya kichu gopana kare thake.
